DataElement.preferredName: Pathology Report Submission Yes No Character Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The medical science, and specialty practice, concerned with all aspects of disease, but with special reference to the essential nature, causes, and development of abnormal conditions, as well as the structural and functional changes that result from the disease processes. Informally used to mean the result of such an examination._A short textual account; having provided a short account._Referred for judgment or consideration; handed over._Indicator of Yes or No to a question.

Informally used to mean the result of such an examination._A short textual account; having provided a short account._Referred for judgment or consideration; handed over.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
